    • snapSize

      public static double snapSize(double value)
      Returns a value ceiled to the nearest pixel.
      Parameters:
      value - the size value to be snapped
      Returns:
      value ceiled to nearest pixel

    • snapPosition

      public static double snapPosition(double value, boolean snapToPixel)
      If snapToPixel is true, then the value is rounded using Math.round. Otherwise, the value is simply returned.
      Parameters:
      value - The value that needs to be snapped
      snapToPixel - Whether to snap to pixel
      Returns:
      value either as passed in or rounded based on snapToPixel

    • snapPosition

      public static double snapPosition(double value)
      Returns a value rounded to the nearest pixel.
      Parameters:
      value - the position value to be snapped
      Returns:
      value rounded to nearest pixel
